title: Ebates Cash Back & Coupons
description:
Shop and save online at over 2,000 stores with coupons and promo codes – all while earning Cash Back! Ebates pays you to shop online! Download the Ebates Android app to discover the best deals, coupons, and discounts at thousands of online stores.

Shopping on your phone is easy and hassle-free with the free Ebates app. There's no rebate form to fill out and no points or miles to redeem. All you need to do is shop through the app to earn Cash Back! Browse hot deals, coupons, and promo codes, and click ""Shop"" to immediately activate Cash Back.

Sign up for a free account and start earning up to 40% Cash Back! Plus, get a $10 bonus now when you make your first purchase through the app.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Ebates works with over 2,000 stores including Sephora, JCPenney, Kohl's, Home Depot, Overstock.com, Groupon, Walmart and more to find you the best online coupons, promo codes, deals, and special offers.

Find your favorite brands and stores on the app, shop and earn a percentage Cash Back on your purchase.

CASH BACK SHOPPING
Earn up to 40% Cash Back at over 2,000 stores including Bed Bath & Beyond, Nordstrom, Sephora, JCPenney, Kohl's, Home Depot, Groupon, and Walmart. Check out special promotions for Double Cash Back offers or find popular coupons for your favorite stores, including Ann Taylor, Bloomingdales, Carter's, GNC, JCPenney, Kate Spade, Kohl's, Macy's, Nautica, Office Depot, Overstock, ShoeBuy, Shoes.com, Under Armour, & Walgreens.

BUY NOW
Buy items instantly through the Ebates app browser. Simply add your items to the cart when you shop and checkout directly on the app. Store your payment and shipping information for quick checkout.

Supported Stores include: Aeropostale, Ashford, Backcountry.com, Cabela's, Disney Store, Gamestop, Joe's New Balance, Lancome, Nike, Overstock.com, Staples, ThinkGeek, UNIQLO, and YOOX.

SHOPPING BROWSER
Activate Cash Back and easily apply coupons, coupon codes, or promo codes in a browser made especially for Ebates shoppers. No need to switch between apps or shop on a mobile browser. We help you find the best deals!

TOP COUPONS
Access thousands of online coupons, deals, promo codes, free shipping, and special offers from stores right on the app. Find coupon codes and earn cash back for online retailers in travel, clothing, health & beauty, and other categories.

HOT DEALS
View Ebates top coupons and deals of the week to make sure you get the most savings. Shop for everything you need, from clothing, shoes, accessories, makeup, toys, games, home goods, kitchen appliances, electronics, sports & outdoor gear, gifts, office supplies and more.

DOUBLE CASH BACK
Get notified of special offers right on the app! Browse stores that are offering Double Cash Back or more during special promotions including Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and throughout the year.

FAVORITE STORES
Easy access to your favorite stores and coupons to make shopping simple. From niceties to necessities, shop top-name merchants for everything from furniture and appliances to airfare and vacation deals.

PRICE COMPARISON
Search for a product or scan its barcode to find out the best place to buy online after your Cash Back.

MY EBATES
Access your Ebates account to see your favorite stores, saved coupons, Cash Pending, Cash Back History, and shopping trips to see what's coming in your next Big Fat Check. Watch your total Cash Back balance grow the more you shop!

PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
Get notified for hot coupons and special promotions! Set up push notifications for trending deals, payment alerts, and anytime you earn Cash Back.

TELL-A-FRIEND
Invite 2 friends to join Ebates to earn $50! Share your special referral link on Facebook, email, or text to your contacts.

NOTE: We request for your location to improve the shopping experience on different merchant sites. For example, at Groupon it will show you deals in your city.
short_desc: Get paid to shop online! Over $250 million paid to customers since 1998!
what_is_new: Thank you for updating to Ebates 4.3.0. In this version we squashed dozens of bugs and made stability and performance enhancements so that you can always earn Cash Back. Happy Shopping!
